snippet.title: Welcome To Silverscale Lake! v1.5- Gameplay Preview
snippet.description:
Looking for an easy-to-keep New Year's Resolution? How about a resolution to try out more indie games in 2024! 

This is a preview of the first 5 minutes of an RPG Maker MV project I've been working on on-and-off since early 2021, and I've finally gotten all of the endings working, which means I'm currently at the point where I need more people who aren't me to try to break it. If you're interested in sinking a couple of hours into a narrative-focused small-town mystery that won't break the bank- OR try to sell you a bunch of stuff!- why not check it out? 

Download Welcome to Silverscale Lake! on itch.io for free or by donation: https://dysperdis.itch.io/welcome-to-silverscale-lake
Follow on FB for updates: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100066911373463
